content: All ‘solutions’ you propose (higher wages for everyone, higher taxes for corporations and the wealthy, and sensible regulations on business), sound good but only drive prices higher. United is clearly taking a beating over this issue. They’ll surely suffer huge losses because they chose not to enable their personnel to offer up greater and greater incentives until a volunteer came forward. I’m sure they’ll examine their policy and make changes because of it. That is the free market working.
